review: Love my fire stick. Works great!!!
author: ERIK ASHER

review: It most likely performs great when there is no interference of any sort going on.  Not sure of why I get delays in the video's yet.  Very discouraging at this point.  I have a newer modem for my wireless... Seems more slow at night time.  Maybe something else is running.  I haven't had a chance to figure it out yet.
author: pamela lynn

review: Love it!!!! It's everything I wanted and more. Easy to use. Mobile. Great. Highly recommend.
author: Stacy A. McKinney

review: Really enjoy using it.  Simply to use.
author: Yanda Mills

review: easy set up, a lot of viewing selection, good price
author: Randy W. Rumfield

review: You have to pay to watch anything good on it even movies from the 60s they want money not happy with it
author: John D. Kelley

review: This might truly be the best purchase I've made in the last few years. I was already a Prime subscriber, so it was just a matter of opening the box, plugging it into the HDMI port on a TV, and barely a week later I've cruised through all of Alpha House and half of Transparent. Under the Dome awaits! I have seen the future, and it DOES NOT involve cable bills.
author: Thomas L. Marchioro

review: I love this product !!! So easy and simple. The only downfall is no hbo go app :-(!
author: Paige
